opinion:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS, 93 Ohio St.3d 1420 (2001) 754 N.E.2d 808Supreme Court of Ohio. 2001.
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS Announcement Wednesday September 12, 200100-1942. State ex rel. Ruscilli Constr. Co. v. Indus. Comm.
Franklin App. No. 99AP-1328. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant's application for dismissal,
IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application for dismissal be, and hereby is, granted.
00-2191. State ex rel. Ruscilli Constr. Co. v. Indus. Comm.
Franklin App. No. 99AP-1328. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant's application for dismissal,
IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application for dismissal be, and hereby is, granted.Page 1421
